description: Keep all forcings the same as ScenarioMIP SSP1-2.6 (aforestation scenario), but replace land use with SSP3-7.0 (deforestation) scenario.  Concentration driven.
keywords: LUMIP, Tier 1, Scenario,  SSP1-2.6 forcing and SSP3-7.0 land use
rationale: Land-use policy sensitivity simulation for the low radiative forcing scenario.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description: Impose RCP2.6 forcing excluding land use. Concentration driven.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6, excluding land use
requirements.label: RCP26 Forcing Excluding Land Use

requirements.description: Impose changing RCP7.0 land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, Land Use
requirements.label: RCP70 Land Use

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration

requirements.description: All applicable land management active in the model configuration.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, all land management, Grassland, Fire, Wood Harvest, Pasture, Crop, Irrigation, Fertilisation
requirements.label: All Land Management Active
